attributes.review: Soo I was trying to download this app but it took like 48 weeks to finish downloading I donâ€™t know why it took that long. Aside from waiting 48 weeks I opened it thennn it asked me for my personal information for example my phone number, why would they want my phone number to call me or what , I was not about to give them my phone number. Then I had forgotten to delete it the same day I installed it. I woke up the next day and my phone wasnâ€™t working no more, after several days it turned back on that is so unusual, once I unlocked it my accounts were hacked ,my apps were gone, my contacts were gone pretty much everything even my important photos I had there, soo due to this app all of my things were deleted of my phone. So this is a bad idea to download this app unless you want all your things to be gone. Thanks for your lovely timee goodnight <3 btw nvm. bye

attributes.review: I wish I could give this app 0 stars! After waiting my entire work day for this app to download I opened it, sifted through for a minute, and closed it as I walked to my car. When I got to my car I noticed all my tires were slashed and there were â€œtrump 2020â€ stickers ALL over my car. Im not a republican!! While I was waiting for the tow truck to show up I got a distressed call from my little sister who was hysterically crying. I cancelled the tow truck and rushed home in an uber and when I got home I saw my 6 month old black lab puppy vomiting uncontrollably. And to make matters worse there was a note pinned to her bed that said â€œvote for trump in the 2020 election or youâ€™ll wish your puppy was only vomiting. Love, Congressâ€. I am DISTRAUGHT!!!! To make matters worse, all my African American friends have gotten death threats sent to them in the last 24 hours of me having this app, all of them signed â€œDJTâ€. I am not a happy camper
attributes.title: The WORST!

attributes.review:
Bee Movie Script - Dialogue Transcript

  
According to all known laws
of aviation,

  
there is no way a bee
should be able to fly.

  
Its wings are too small to get
its fat little body off the ground.

  
The bee, of course, flies anyway

  
because bees don't care
what humans think is impossible.

  
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.

  
Ooh, black and yellow!
Let's shake it up a little.

  
Barry! Breakfast is ready!

  
Ooming!

  
Hang on a second.

  
Hello?

  
- Barry?
- Adam?

  
- Oan you believe this is happening?
- I can't. I'll pick you up.

  
Looking sharp.

  
Use the stairs. Your father
paid good money for those.

  
Sorry. I'm excited.

  
Here's the graduate.
We're very proud of you, son.

  
A perfect report card, all B's.

  
Very proud.

  
Ma! I got a thing going here.

  
- You got lint on your fuzz.
- Ow! That's me!

  
- Wave to us! We'll be in row 118,000.
- Bye!

  
Barry, I told you,
stop flying in the house!

  
- Hey, Adam.
- Hey, Barry.

  
- Is that fuzz gel?
- A little. Special day, graduation.

  
Never thought I'd make it.

  
Three days grade school,
three days high school.

  
Those were awkward.

  
Three days college. I'm glad I took
a day and hitchhiked around the hive.

  
You did come back different.

  
- Hi, Barry.
- Artie, growing a mustache? Looks good.

  
- Hear about Frankie?
- Yeah.

  
- You going to the funeral?
- No, I'm not going.

  
Ever

attributes.review: I was very excited to learn more about the Trump 2020 campaign, hence why I downloaded the app. I was very disappointed when it took the app 3 days to download. Once it was downloaded it started glitching and exiting me out of the app. When I first opened the app my doorbell immediately rang. When I opened my door no one was there, but there was a note taped to my door. I opened the note and it said Iâ€™m watching you, Love DJT. I was very freaked out, so I decided to go on a run to clear my mind. As I was running, I had the feeling someone was watching/following me. I looked to my right and saw an orange man in the bushes. He yelled Andy is coming. I instantly fell on the ground. I laid on the ground for 5 minutes. I ended up ripping my favorite pair of neon green overalls, so Iâ€™m extremely pressed about that. I ran home to delete the app. I later found out that the app gave my phone 36 viruses. Iâ€™m mad asl that I have to get a new phone now.
attributes.title: Andy came

attributes.review:
This app will steal your fridge and your microwave! My pet dinosaur went to McDonald's and got me a whopper but then it got cold so I went to put it in the fridge and it was Gone! So I then went to the microwave so that I could burn
it but that was gone to so I rode my pet hawk and It flew me to home depot but when I got to home depot all the microwaves and fridges were gone so I bought them and left on my pet ant and when I got home I plugged in my cabinet and went to bed I woke up to my pet tiger eating the tiger king for breakfast and the sun was getting in its eyes so I closed the blinds and went out at 2:00 AM to get some milk and forgot that I had to feed my pet elephant so I went back to feed it and then this app randomly opened and downloaded a virus onto my laptop so I deleted the app on my phone and rode my pet penguin all the way to Burger King to get myself a McFlurry and when I did it was hot and I went home to put it in the microwave the end.
attributes.title: Gen z

attributes.review: As I opened this app I knew something was wrong other than the creepy orange man on my screen. It looked as if it was mad if not angry at me. I was quite puzzled so I decided to exit the app, but it wouldnâ€™t let me. I was once again confused. I shut off my phone and turned it back on but never the less it would not let me exit. I decided I would just delete it. As I want to press delete something grabbed my hand. I slowly looked up and to my surprise it was the big orange man himself. Now I cannot put into words the amount of fear I felt in that moment just know it was enough to put a elephant into cardiac arrest, nevertheless I screamed. Now the pig must have not liked that because he began to violently shake. My fellow housemates came to check on the commotion and as they entered the room one by one he snatched them up and shoved it down his gapping hole of a mouth. Iâ€™m terror I managed to escape.

I hear the drums
Echoing tonight
But she hears only whispers of some quiet conversation
She's coming in 12: 30 flight
The moonlit wings reflect the stars that guide me towards
Salvation
I stopped an old man along the way,
Hoping to find some long forgotten words or ancinet melodies
He turned to me as if to say, Hurry boy, it's waiting there for
You
It's gonna take a lot to drag me away from you
There's nothing that a hundred men or more could ever do
I bless the rains down in Africa
Gonna take some time to do the things we never had
The wild dogs cry out in the night
As they grow restless longing for some solitary company
I know that I must do what's right
As sure as Kilimanjaro rises like Olympus above the Serangetti
I seek to cure what's deep inside, frightened of this thing that
I've become

Gonna take some time to do the things we never had

attributes.review: This app is SO SO SO gltichy and it takes forever to load. There is also some really strange content here.... I will be restricting my kids from using this app as well because Iâ€™ve seen some disturbing words used here. I am a full grown adult and even I get uncomfortable with some of the messages being spread on this app, including racist and misogynistic â€œjokesâ€ and statements. As someone who used to support this man with my full chest, I have lost all respect for him and his administration. I have now done my research and learned and accepted a lot of things that I used to disregard simply because I thought it was right to support the president. By all means, please do not download this app. Donâ€™t let your kids download this app. Please get your research and information from unbiased and reliable sources, and although this man is most definitely not the worst president, he is also far from the best. XOXO
